dict.acceptation: 有效的；起作用的；实际的，实在的；给人深刻印象；

sent.orig: How effective is our human resource management? Do we an effective indicator for HRM performance?
sent.trans: 我们的人力资源管理是否有效？我们是否有有效的评估人力资源管理的指标？

sent.orig: The effective strain and effective stress are introduced under the condition of axial symmetry.
sent.trans: 进一步针对轴对称问题，引入等效应变和等效应力。

sent.orig: Using more effective complex bodies will be effective approach for advancing performance of the catalysts.
sent.trans: 配位体的类型对催化剂活性有显著影响，寻找更有效的配位体是提高催化剂性能的有效途径。

sent.orig: Editor's comment: SCIG is safe and effective and could be more effective than IVIG.
sent.trans: 编者按：SCIG治疗是安全有效的，且比IVIG治疗更加经济。

sent.orig: Why were China's agricultural reforms effective and to what extent really were they effective?
sent.trans: 为何中国的农业改革会有效？会有效到何种程度？
